channel.title: HKUST(GZ) on EICP-LAB
channel.description: Recent content in HKUST(GZ) on EICP-LAB

item.title: Academic Seminar
item.description: Professor Johannes Van Biesebroeck from KU Leuven (Belgium) was invited to give a seminar titled “Imperfect (Re)allocation in Imperfect Markets: Evidence from China’s Pilot Carbon ETS”.

item.title: CNCC Green Bag
item.description: MPhil student Siyuan Fan participated in CNCC Green Bag and delivered a talk about “Identifying Climate Adaptation Projects in Local Government Bonds Using LLMs".

item.title: Academic Seminar
item.description: Professor Pan He from Cardiff University was invited to give a seminar titled “The Global Food-Environment-Health Nexus: A Consumption-Side Perspective".

item.title: Academic Seminar
item.description: Professor Chi Man YIP from the Hong Kong Polytechnic University was invited to give a seminar titled “When Porter Goes Broke: Finance and Innovation Under Climate Risk".

item.title: Academic seminar
item.description: Professor Dayong Zhang from Southwestern University of Finance and Economics was invited to give a seminar on “Climate Risks and Financial Markets” and to attend our group meeting.

item.title: CNCC Green Bag
item.description: PhD student Yang Zhang participated in CNCC Green Bag and delivered a talk about “Solar photovoltaic integration in mining regions:evaluating global energy potential and benefits to sustainability".

item.title: Academic seminar
item.description: Professor Yong Geng from the School of Environmental Science and Engineering at Shanghai Jiao Tong University was invited to give a seminar about National Nature Science Foundation Project.

item.title: CNCC Green Bag
item.description: PhD student Zhenhuan Yang participated in CNCC Green Bag and delivered a talk about “Raining on Bonds: The Financing Costs of Extreme Rain on Urban Investment Bonds".

item.title: Academic SEMINAR
item.description: Professor Mengmeng Guo from the School of Finance at Nanjing Agricultural University was invited to give a seminar titled “Flooded Venture: Extreme Rainfall and Entrepreneurship” at HKUST (GZ) and to participate in our group meeting.

item.title: CNCC Green Bag
item.description: PhD student Jiao Xiong participated in CNCC Green Bag and delivered a talk about “Technological change from fossil-fuel to renewable: Evidence from offshore energy”.

item.title: CNCC Workshop
item.description: Professor Yangsiyu Lu attended the Carbon Pricing and Climate Change in the Data-rich World Workshop held by CNCC Trust and gave a talk titled “Raining on Bonds: The Financing Costs of Extreme Rain on Urban Investment Bonds”.
